result.text: Even BTC price dropped significantly upon the news, but wanted to flag that you and me and everyone are all witnessing the HISTORY. Witnessing Trump sign the executive order to establish Bitcoin as a strategic reserve marks a monumental chapter in the annals of financial innovation. One can only imagine the profound satisfaction Satoshi Nakamoto must feel, seeing his creation ascend to such historic prominence. This moment signifies not just the validation of cryptocurrency but a bold stride into the future of global finance. So let‚Äôs focus on the long-term #Bitcoin #FinancialRevolution #SatoshiNakamoto

result.text:
I believe the market wants to squeeze up

I shorted the news yesterday as the market was buying into an obvious event (the only surprise would‚Äôve been announcing BTC purchases without congressional approval). The down move cleared a bunch of OI

Now let‚Äôs look at the medium-term picture. We‚Äôre one of the largest perp MMs and we have been seeing a weird dynamic leaving us pretty net long over the last 2 wks: 
- price goes up -> people short 
- price goes down -> people short

(An easy heuristic to track this is to follow perp permium vs spot, MMs will usually be long if premium is neg for a sufficient time. Oversimplification bc OI/spot context also matter, but u get the idea)

Hyperliquid can also give some insight into positioning: global bias among largest traders has been overwhelmingly short over the last 2 wks (https://t.co/ZY5Sh97aFO) 

Finally, I expect price to follow narrative, adding further reflexivity. If price goes up, Trump‚Äôs actions are now bullish, and more buyers pile in.
